pullrequest.title: More examples: install, create core library, find dependency, check pkg-config requires

content.raw:
the [windows build fails](https://build.osrfoundation.org//job/ignition_cmake-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/70) with these new tests:

~~~
-- Searching for dependencies of ignition-core_no_deps
CMake Error at D:/Jenkins/workspace/ignition_cmake-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/ws/ign-cmake/build/install/Release/lib/cmake/ignition-core_no_deps/ignition-core_no_deps-targets.cmake:75 (message):
  The imported target "ignition-core_no_deps::ignition-core_no_deps"
  references the file

     "D:/Jenkins/workspace/ignition_cmake-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/ws/ign-cmake/build/install/Release/lib/ignition-core_no_deps.lib"

  but this file does not exist.  Possible reasons include:

  * The file was deleted, renamed, or moved to another location.

  * An install or uninstall procedure did not complete successfully.

  * The installation package was faulty and contained

     "D:/Jenkins/workspace/ignition_cmake-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/ws/ign-cmake/build/install/Release/lib/cmake/ignition-core_no_deps/ignition-core_no_deps-targets.cmake"

  but not all the files it references.
~~~

any ideas @mxgrey ?
